script.name: plugin.expguild.spawn
script.sourceplaintext:
$exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' skip if $exp.data return null
skip if $a.item return null
gosub sub.GetLocation if $sector -> exists $maintype = get maintype of ware $a.item $subtype = get subtype of ware $a.item if $maintype == [SSTYPE_SHIP] gosub sub.CreateShip else gosub sub.CreateCrate end
gosub sub.DoDiscovery end
return $obj
sub.GetLocation: $sector.data = $exp.data['sectors'] if $a.race == Player $sub.table = $sector.data else $sub.table = table alloc $sector = get next key: table=$sector.data key=null while $sector $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race if $sector.owner == $a.race $sub.table[$sector] = $sector end $sector = get next key: table=$sector.data key=$sector end end
while size of table $sub.table $sector = get random key: table=$sub.table $attempts = 20 gosub sub.GetLocationPosition skip if $ret.PosFailed break remove key $sector from table $sector.data remove key $sector from table $sub.table @ = wait 10 ms end endsub
sub.GetLocationPosition: $ret.PosFailed = [FALSE] $try.again = [TRUE] while $attempts > 0 AND $try.again dec $attempts = $try.again = [FALSE] if $a.largeRadius $dist = $sector -> get size of object $dist = $dist * 2 $max.dist = $dist * 2
$pos.x = random value from $dist to $max.dist - 1 $pos.y = random value from 15000 to 35000 - 1 $pos.z = random value from $dist to $max.dist - 1 else $dist = $sector -> get size of object $max.dist = $dist * 2
$pos.x = random value from $dist to $max.dist - 1 $pos.y = random value from 5000 to 25000 - 1 $pos.z = random value from $dist to $max.dist - 1 end
do if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $pos.x = - $pos.x do if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $pos.y = - $pos.y do if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $pos.z = - $pos.z
$pos.array = create new array, arguments=$pos.x, $pos.y, $pos.z, null, null gosub sub.CheckInPlanet if $ret.InPlanet @ = wait 10 ms $try.again = [TRUE] end end do if $attempts <= 0 AND $try.again $ret.PosFailed = [TRUE] endsub
sub.CreateCrate: $obj = create flying ware: maintype=$maintype subtype=$subtype count=$a.qty sector=$sector x=$pos.x y=$pos.y z=$pos.z selfdestruct=[FALSE] $obj ->set flying ware secret: [TRUE] $obj ->set invincible: enabled=[TRUE] do if $a.blueprint $obj ->set flying ware as blueprint: [TRUE] endsub
sub.CreateShip: $obj = create ship: type=$a.item owner=Neutral Race addto=$sector x=$pos.x y=$pos.y z=$pos.z if $a.qty == 2 $obj ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.S] else if $a.qty == 3 $obj ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.M] else if $a.qty == 4 $obj ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.L] if $a.item == Scout = $obj -> install 1 units of Alpha Kyon Emitter else if $a.item == Interceptor = $obj -> install 2 units of Alpha Kyon Emitter else if $a.item == Fighter = $obj -> install 3 units of Beta Kyon Emitter end else if $a.qty == 5 $obj ->add default items to ship: loadout=[ShipLoad.Minimum], marines=[FALSE] else if $a.qty == 6 $obj ->add default items to ship: loadout=[ShipLoad.Average], marines=[FALSE] else if $a.qty == 7 $obj ->add default items to ship: loadout=[ShipLoad.Maximum], marines=[FALSE] end endsub
sub.DoDiscovery: if $obj -> exists $obj.sector = $obj -> get sector $dist = $obj.sector -> get size of object if $discovery.large.range $min.dist = 100000 else $min.dist = 150000 end $obj.pos = $obj -> get position as array $centre.pos = create new array, arguments=0, 0, 0, null, null $centre.dist = get distance: position array1=$obj.pos array2=$centre.pos $centre.dist = $centre.dist / 2 $dist = get maximum, $dist, $min.dist, $centre.dist, null, null $obj ->set LFL target: [TRUE], range=$dist $obj ->set discovery points: points=$a.points
if $DEFINE.LOGGING $obj.sector = $obj -> get sector $pos = $obj -> get position as array write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='Discovery Created: %s, Sector=%s (%s) Points=%s', $obj, $obj.sector, $pos, $a.points, null end end endsub
sub.CheckInPlanet: $ret.InPlanet = [FALSE] $planets = $sector -> get planet array if $planets $i.p = size of array $planets while $i.p dec $i.p = $planet = $planets[$i.p] $planet.pos = $planet -> get position as array $planet.dist = get distance: position array1=$pos.array array2=$planet.pos gosub sub.GetPlanetRadius if $planet.dist < $planet.radius $ret.InPlanet = [TRUE] break end end end endsub
sub.GetPlanetRadius: $planet.radius = 100000 *$planet.radius = 650000 $table.planet.radius = $exp.data['planet.radius'] if $table.planet.radius $planet.sub = $planet -> get subtype $planet.radius = $table.planet.radius[$planet.sub] end endsub return null

line.text: add default items to ship: loadout=
add default items to ship: loadout=
add default items to ship: loadout=
write to player logbook: printf: type=
